short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empower non-Doc-Makers to create/update Coda pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To use the extension, click on the extension icon to show the extension popup. The extension icon is displayed in the browser toolbar, next to the omnibox. After installation, it appears in the extensions menu (the puzzle piece icon). You can pin the extension icon to the toolbar for ease of access.
